metadata.dc:title: Jolly Roger Flag
metadata.dc:creator: Calico Jack
metadata.dc:subject: Pirates
Piracy
Flag
Symbol
metadata.dc:description: Black and white flag flown on the ship of Jack Rackham. On the flag is a skull and crossbones that became the symbol of pirates everywhere.
metadata.dc:coverage: Golden Age of Piracy; start=1650; end=1730
metadata.dc:rights: This item has been made available for use in research, teaching, and private study. Researchers are responsible for using these materials in accordance with Title 17 of the United States Code and any other applicable statutes.
metadata.dcterms:audience: Researchers interested in historical representation in popular culture
